english.segment1: Thinking how it might have been. If you had never. Walked into my life. I would have been nothing. Without you where would I be
english.segment2: Every moment used to feel. Like living through a. Cold and starless night. But everything's changing. Everything is feeling right
english.segment3: Chorus: You gave me your love. Lifted me up. Now I'm looking at forever. When I never thought. I'd ever see that far. You, you're in my soul. Wherever I go. Now I know right from the start. Your love was. Written on my heart
english.segment4: How could I have been so blind. When you were always here. So near to me. And there is no other. Who knows me the way. I feel you do
english.segment5: And you were waiting all the time. For me to come around. And finally see. All the love I was missing. There you were right beside me. Always beside me
english.segment7: You made it so easy. Your love brought out. The best in me. You are my light and my truth. I've found my destiny in you
english.segment9: You're forever. Written on my heart
